data.md:MetaData: Age determination of sediment core JARVEOTS, Lake Jarveotsa, Estonia

central part of the lake. Local vegetation: Phragmites, Carex, Typha (littoral belt). Core diameter: 7 cm. Area: 16.9 ha. Lake with narrow floating math. Physiography: between eskers. Surrounding vegetation: spruce and pine, Betula.
